alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 3:47PM EDT until June 13 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 247 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Florala, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bonifay, Union, Liberty, Paxton, Caryville, Westville, Black, Cluster Springs, Gaskin, Cerrogordo, Darlington, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, Glendale, Center Ridge, Smith Crossroads, Hickory Hill, Izagora, New Harmony and New Hope. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
